1.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

2.text: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

3.text: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.

4.text: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.

5.text: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.

6.text: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
